thread.section_title: Alaska Northern Lights Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Alaska Northern Lights | alaskanorthernlights.com
thread.title: CBeagle
thread.title_full: Alaska Northern Lights reviewed by CBeagle

author: CBeagle
title: CBeagle
text: I have used my lightbox for several years (10+) and found it to be very helpful during the Winter months. For a variety of reasons I did not use it last year and this year I found it would not turn on. I no longer had the paperwork on it so took it to three different local electricians and alltold me it could not be fixed. I almost threw it out but decided to try a last ditch effort of contacting Alaska Northern Lights. I emailed the company and with 12 hours had a response with a mailing label and instructions to return it for an estimate for fixing it. I sent it back and within just a few days Beth Kusiak emailed me that the box needed several parts so instead of replacing them they were going to send me a whole new light box AT NO CHARGE! Amazing! I would whole heartedly recommend this company and their products to anyone who asks.
